projects.title: LP Department Improvement Plan
projects.description:
Project Goal:
Supporting OBS LP management by executing various internal projects to improve LP processes and organisation. One was to ensure a battery of processes in the cost management field (improve the cost savings with old contracts/invoices and search for not billed services) Another was to define standard reporting for Account Directors to client and define migration to new depository control of program documentation
Achievement:
Managed both projects and succeeded in implementing procedures to avoid further costs in dealing with old contracts and define new documentations templates as well as use of depository system.
Project Size (Finance / # Project Members):
No costs defined / 17 members indirect - 0 direct

contributors.headline: Senior Digital IT Modernization Architect at DXC Technology

projects.title: Operational ITIL Reporting for Philip Morris
projects.description:
Project Goal:
To manage all reports in the FMO stage. Was in a critical path and client requirements for reporting such as capacity management, SLA/SLO needed to be delivered as soon as possible while running an improvement plan and managing the internal factory to deliver the report. 
Achievement:
Move from contractually 1500 reports to 495 reports, generated either manually or via tools for 14 service blocks. All reports ready and Data Integrity/ Improvement Plan Project Completed.
Project Size (Finance / # Project Members):
No costs defined / 32 members indirect - 5 direct

projects.title: Pre-Sales M-Group and Bluestar
projects.description:
Goal and achievement:
Represented LP OBS organization to architect the LP workload and initial set-up of overall planning and ABU governance; provided the Bid Team with the necessary documentation for the above with associated costs. 
Value:
The total value of contracts ranged from 280 to 350 million Euro's. Program Budget ranged from 2.2 to 7 million Euro.   
Teams: Up to 4 people reporting and performing various bid activities for the bidding.

profile_positions.description:
The role consists of various areas such as:
* Client facing advisory with LIVE demo capabilities such as MLOps/DataOps/DevOps
* Client facing & account agile lean governance
* Support build of DXC digital services 
* Innovative solutions
* Change agent

Besides the various areas will also  include:
* Pre-sales Solutioning
* Business Acumen
* Strategic
* Engagement Delivery
* Opportunity Pursuit
* Leadership
* Consulting
* Communication
profile_positions.title: EMEA Senior Digital Modernization - Pre-sales / Strategist

profile_positions.description:
General
Business, application portfolio and Hybrid IT advisory. Workplace, IoT, focusing more building the digital core with business driven aspects and follow the best path through the digital transformation.
Continue to bring innovation ideas into the Sales and Practice and portfolio environment.

Specific
Identifying of customer's business needs – Cx, LoB and Board level communication
Helping customers with definition of Digital Business Strategy 
Advisory for Transformation to Digital and Hybrid cloud areas
Contribution to Digital, DevOps and Agile/Scrum projects. 
Helping customers with Digital Business Strategy and its processing
Development of methods for supporting of innovation and change across the company
Advisory for Transformation to Digital and Hybrid cloud areas
Participation on digital transformation projects
profile_positions.title: EMEA Strategic Advisor & Consultant for Digital IT Modernization

profile_positions.description: Applies advanced subject matter knowledge to solve complex business issues and is regarded as a subject matter expert. Frequently contributes to the development of new ideas and methods. Works on complex problems where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of multiple factors. Leads and/or provides expertise to functional project teams and may participate in cross-functional initiatives. Acts as an expert providing direction and guidance to process improvements and establishing policies. Frequently represents the organisation to external customers/clients. Exercises significant independent judgment within broadly defined policies and practices to determine the best method for accomplishing work and achieving objectives. Also provide mentoring and guidance to lower level employees.

profile_positions.title: WW Advisory Services Offering Manager

profile_positions.description:
The advisory role has been established to accelerate growth and innovation in existing accounts as well as to support new opportunities/logo's. Working in the early stages of the sales life-cycle the role will use proven methodologies as part of a consulting engagement, including workshops, modelling and assessments, to transform ideas into proposals. Primary goal is to guide account teams and clients to move towards RFI/RFP stage, support governance of pre-sales approaches managed by strong qualification. The role has a direct link to HP practices & Portfolio which will lead to innovation & New Style of IT

The advisory services, highlighted below, are examples of key areas to drive growth and innovation:
Helion Hybrid Cloud with Helion Virual Private Clouded & Helion Managed Private Cloud & Helion Public Cloud Services) - All "Infrastructure as a Service" - IaaS
On top including:
- "Software as a Service" - "SaaS
- "Platform as a Service" - PaaS
- "Business Process as a Service" - BPaaS
- Governance
- Application to Cloud" Strategies

Latest Innovation: Move up to 70% of your workload quickly to Helion Virtual Private Cloud or Hybrid for immediate cost savings and improved cloud services with strong security!
profile_positions.title: Cloud & Workload Advisor

profile_positions.description:
ITO Consultancy
The ITO consulting group has been established to accelerate growth and innovation in existing accounts as well as to support new opportunities.  Working in the early stages of the sales life-cycle an ITO consultant will use proven methodologies as part of a consulting engagement, including workshops, modelling and assessments, to transform ideas into proposals. Governance of pre-sales approaches are managed to ensure a firm and strong qualification.

The consulting services, highlighted below, are examples of key areas to drive growth and innovation:
Cloud (Virtual Private, Private, Converged and Public Cloud Services)
Enterprise Mobility
Enterprise Collaboration
Governance
profile_positions.title: ITO Consultant / Customer Project / Programme Manager

profile_positions.description:
The role included the following activities:
1. Manage Life Cycle Program management for major outsourcing contracts
2. Manage the overall transition and migration to end-state as Regional Manager
3. Running strong Quality management and Program office
4. Participating in Bid Management deals for Large Projects
5. Performed PM development functions
profile_positions.title: Large Project Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. Lead complex delivery projects typically spanning multiple regions or countries and involving hundreds of client locations and potentially multiple sub-contractors and suppliers
2. Manage and produce key project document; project charter, communication plan, SDK, project plan, risk and change management etc
3. Negotiation of service contract criteria
4. Ensure a high quality billing process and timely collections
5. Supporting Bid Management activities in pre-sales phase
6. Support sales force in presenting PM in front of clients / Business Consultancy
profile_positions.title: Business Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
1. Set up systems and methods to allow all team members to work in the most efficient manner. 
2. Take full responsibility for delivery of small projects, either as stand-alone projects, or as part of a larger project
3. Develop and maintain adequate processes and procedures to ensure the area is managed professionally and meets the requirements of ISO 9000 registration
4. Co-ordinations of project engineering resource, allocation of jobs, resource planning and cost control. Liaise with Project Managers, Project Engineers, logistics and Integration to ensure projects are delivered on time and to budget. Tracking of equipment orders to ensure project time scales are not compromised
profile_positions.title: Project Co-ordinator Level II

profile_positions.description:
1. Responsible for build-up and transition of EUMA Call-desk based in Amsterdam to London, UK. Implement Project Planning and allocation/training for new staff.  
2. To monitor and ensure customer service and establish quality support during the transition process
3. Exceed and satisfy Customer requirements and develop customer interface 
4. Responsible for Service delivery by establishing flow-call procedures between Lufthansa Systems and GSC. Consulting and supporting an alteration of the internal support structure at customers premises
